entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
